hero.summary: Dynamic Web Experience demo for CSCI6313. Content is loaded dynamically from content.json to simulate a CMS-driven site.

sections.title: About
sections.body: This section is loaded from a JSON file and demonstrates dynamic content loading similar to modern CMS-driven sites.

sections.title: Features
sections.body: Dynamic content, Responsive Design, Accessibility (WCAG), Google Maps integration, and Client-side validation.

sections.title: Personalization
sections.body: Content can be personalized for users (stored preferences, localStorage) and updated without changing HTML files.
